PaymentSchedulePolicy.name: PaymentSchedulePolicy
PaymentSchedulePolicy.description: Represents information about the configuration for the payment schedule.

Description.description: The user-entered description for the payment schedule policy.

IsOrgDefault.description: If the payment schedule policy is the default policy for the org, this value is set to true. If not, this value is set to false. An org can have only one default payment policy.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Name.description: The user-entered name of the payment schedule policy.

OwnerId.description: Required. The ID of the owner of the PaymentSchedulePolicy record.

Status.description: The status of the payment schedule policy.
